name: GetSKUComplementsbyComplementTypeID
description:
Retrieves all the existing SKU Complements with the same Complement Type ID of a specific SKU. 

## Response body example

```json
[
    {
        "Id": 61,
        "SkuId": 7,
        "ParentSkuId": 1,
        "ComplementTypeId": 1
    }
]
```

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

skuId.description: ID of the SKU which will be inserted as a Complement in the Parent SKU.

complementTypeId.description: Complement Type ID. This represents the type of the complement. The possible values are: `1` for Accessory; `2` for Suggestion; `3` for Similar Product; `5` for Show Together.

$ul: **ComplementTypeId**: Complement Type ID. This represents the type of the complement. The possible values are: `1` for Accessory; `2` for Suggestion; `3` for Similar Product; `5` for Show Together.
**ParentSkuId**: ID of the Parent SKU, where the Complement will be inserted.
**SkuId**: ID of the SKU which will be inserted as a Complement in the Parent SKU.
